item.description:
Debbie Bennet, Certified Yoga Instructor and Clare Vidich, Director, Kirpal Retreat Center will be facilitating this mini-yoga retreat.

Yoga gives you strength and flexibility and reduces stress in the body. Meditation keeps you calm and peaceful all day long and connects you with the love already inside you. Yoga is for your body. Meditation is for your soul.

Limit 25 people. Prior registration required: newenginfo@sos.org; 781.444.9013.
Wear comfortable clothing and bring a mat. No experience necessary.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Yoga, Meditation, and You
